text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
At the 『Oka Sho』……3rd. The 『Oaks』……2nd. 
And finally, her last chance at her dream, when 
she was the favorite at the 『Shuuka Sho』……3rd.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Is there anyone who would understand that? The 
shattered dreams of a maiden. As one burns to 
dust, the dream that grew from it will not go out……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
For me――Air Messiah. With this body――the product 
of a bloodline with a long-held desire.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Our current opponent is Team <Ascella> who are in top condition. 
I'll do whatever it takes to defeat Cesario……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, Trainer-san, I have a request. I am well aware 
of how shameless this is……but can we hold a mock race?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: The distance――2400m. Counter-clockwise.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
――!? 
The same conditions as the 『Oaks』, is it?

Air Messiah. A girl being taught by my colleague, 
the 『Genius』 trainer, is requesting a mock race.

Air Messiah. A girl being taught by my colleague, 
the 『Genius』 trainer, is requesting a mock race.

This was quite an irregular request. 
To run against a rival just before the actual 『Oaks』 was……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: What should we do, Trainer?

I decided that avoiding this was worse, and could 
negatively impact us, so I decided to take it head on.

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ready――Start!

It would be the first race in the Tiara rotation 
that was 2400m. It would require stamina. In this way, 
the mock race would simulate the Tokyo race course.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(In the 『Oka Sho』 I was barely able to finish 
before her. But this time, we're running a 
distance that's my specialty. In that case――)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I won't fall behind! I might not have real race experience 
with this distance but――we're both the same in that regard)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(――!? 
This is……different from the 『Oka Sho』)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(At the 『Oka Sho』 I fell behind. 
But I won't repeat that mistake again)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(It's true that I'm not familiar with this 
distance. But it's not unfamiliar to "us"……!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(Ever since I was young, I've listened to my mother 
talk about her experiences, and I've been doing image 
training to run on the turf in Fuchu. On top of that――)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(The 『Oaks』 and even the 『Japan Derby』. Those that have come 
before me, I've burned their image in to my own eyes!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: I can see it! The route――I should take!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: This is nothing! Right here――!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario & Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Haaaaaaaa!! 
Haaaaaaa!

The only thing left was a straight. 
But, it seemed like Air Messiah had slightly more power.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, thank you very much. As I thought, 
for the 『Oaks』 you will be my strongest rival.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah. 
It seems that I was――a little conceited.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I could feel her spirit more than during the 『Oka Sho』. 
Or maybe losing that last race had lit a fire in her.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: But still, her running strategy……

――Think. It wasn't a difference in race sense. 
I'm sure that was……
Strength born from practice.
Strength born from practice.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: From practice……?

Yeah, after learning from her mother, she must have 
spent hours repeatedly simulating that in practice.

Yeah, after learning from her mother, she must have 
spent hours repeatedly simulating that in practice.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
From her mother…… 
I see, so that's the reason……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I didn't think I could lose. It's the distance I'm 
best at, and Kraft had entrusted her feelings to me.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But she also had similar emotions entrusted to her…… 
On top of that, if their experiences have also been passed down……

Cesario is strong. But today, we learned that 
there were those who were catching up to us.

Cesario is strong. But today, we learned that 
there were those who were catching up to us.

It'll be okay, Cesario. 
We just need to think things over once more.

It'll be okay, Cesario. 
We just need to think things over once more.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Think things over…… think about countermeasures, you mean?

Yeah, you need to think about how to counter Air Messiah. That's 
why, Cesario, you don't need to rush. You should rest for today.

Yeah, you need to think about how to counter Air Messiah. That's 
why, Cesario, you don't need to rush. You should rest for today.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……okay, I understand.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'll try to put my own thoughts in order. 
In some quiet place. Well then……

I watched as Cesario left, thinking. It seemed like something 
impactful would need to happen in order to help her secure victory.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: The church…… If it's here then……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(That's right, I can't just keep leaving everything 
to Trainer. I need to win for Kraft too! To do that……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I need even more strength. I need to train more than ever…… 
No, I need something more fundamental――a new inspiration)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(If I can't, then I won't stand a chance against 
Air Messiah-san. I need a kind of strength that 
I've never known before. To obtain that……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Eh……?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Who's there? 
Who is that――over there?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: It's someone I haven't seen before――in the church.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: You…… Wait, you are……
